data.name: 0000 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Accident Outbreak!

data.name: 0001 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When an "Accident" happens, the "Haruhi Route" is displayed on top of the top screen

data.name: 0002 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: When Suzumiya Haruhi reaches the red text "Accident Point,"

data.name: 0003 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: A penalty event will be forced to occur.

data.name: 0004 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: An Accident occurring means the time limit will be decreased substantially.

data.name: 0005 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: There are 2 ways to avoid "Accidents."

data.name: 0006 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 1. Acquire the corresponding "Main Topic."

data.name: 0007 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Topic," is a general term for a keyword or item that serves to distract Haruhi,

data.name: 0008 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: or keep her "Delayed."

data.name: 0009 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: They are obtained based on what member is distracting Haruhi in the event story.

data.name: 0010 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: It is possible to distribute group members in a pattern that,

data.name: 0011 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: allows each member to potentially receive a different "Topic."

data.name: 0012 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: There are 4 types of Topics.

data.name: 0013 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: A "Main Topic" affects the story.

data.name: 0014 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Haruhi Topics" affect Suzumiya Haruhi's behavior.

data.name: 0015 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Character Topics" affect the SOS Brigade member's behavior.

data.name: 0016 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: "Sub Topics" are snippets of casual conversations. Those are the 4 types.

data.name: 0017 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Among these, acquiring the Main Topic,

data.name: 0018 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: will allow you to automatically evade the corresponding Accident.

data.name: 0019 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: 2. Using the Haruhi Topic.

data.name: 0020 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: After Goal Distribution, depending on Kyon's actions during the event,

data.name: 0021 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: you will be able to acquire a Haruhi Topic.

data.name: 0022 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: There are certain unavoidable Accidents you cannot use a Main Topic on.

data.name: 0023 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: But if you use a Haruhi Topic on them, you will force the Accident to be evaded.

data.name: 0024 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: However, the Haruhi Topic is more difficult to obtain than the others.

data.name: 0025 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Please think carefully before using them.

data.name: 0026 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: To compensate, the only Topics that will carry over between episodes,

data.name: 0027 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: is Haruhi Topics.

data.name: 0028 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: There is one other possible method of evading unavoidable Accidents.

data.name: 0029 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Using a Topic on an Event Point above the Haruhi Route,

data.name: 0030 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: will trigger a Delay Event.

data.name: 0031 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: By presenting a keyword Topic to Suzumiya Haruhi,

data.name: 0032 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: it is possible to distract and delay her for a short time.

data.name: 0033 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The time she's delayed for depends on the contents of the Topic, and the member with her.

data.name: 0034 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Although it could change based on different combinations, in general the order is as follows:

data.name: 0035 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Haruhi Topic - Large time limit increase.

data.name: 0036 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Kyon Topic - Ordinary time limit increase.

data.name: 0037 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Sub Topic - Small time limit increase.

data.name: 0038 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The Haruhi Topic has the ability to negate accidents.

data.name: 0039 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: And by delaying her, it is also able to increase the time limit drastically.

data.name: 0040 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: This increase your options during Investigation Mode, letting you search often.

data.name: 0041 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Try to get as many Topics as you can.

data.name: 0042 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The number of Topics you have and choices you make during conversations are important.

data.name: 0043 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Allocating group members purposefully is of the utmost importance.

data.name: 0044 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Please identify the characteristics of each member and after thinking carefully,

data.name: 0045 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: distribute them according to what each is well suited for.

data.name: 0046 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: The behavior of the members who don't accompany Kyon are also important factors.

data.name: 0047 (585.ja) INFO (インフォ)
data.value: Try distributing group members in various ways to test out what combo works best!
